All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminActivity
This class represents the parent activity page used for admins, which holds all the functionality for switching between admin fragments.
AdminActivityUITest
 
AdminDatabase
Class holding all the admin related functions that interact with the database.
AdminDatabase.OnFacilityDetailsLoadedListener
Interface for facility detail loading methods and errors associated with it
AdminDatabase.OnNameLoadedListener
Interface for name loading classes
AdminDatabaseTest
 
AdminEventAdapter
This is the adapter for the event page that admins can browse
AdminEventAdapter.EventViewHolder
ViewHolder used for the event data
AdminEventListFragment
Fragment to display the event stored in the database as lists that only admins can browse.
AdminHomeFragment
Fragment for the admins home page which displays statistics regarding events, users, facilities and the biggest events on the app.
AdminImageAdapter
This is the adapter for the images page that admins can browse
AdminImageAdapter.ImageData
Class that holds image data
AdminImageAdapter.ImageViewHolder
ViewHolder used for the image data
AdminImageListFragment
Fragment to display the images stored in the database as lists that only admins can browse.
AdminProfileListFragment
Fragment to display the user profiles stored in the database as lists that only admins can browse
AdminRemoveEventFragment
This is the fragment that allows admins to delete events
AdminRemoveProfileFragment
This is the fragment that allows admins to delete user profiles
AdminSearchFragment
Fragment for admin search features/functionality
AdminSearchViewPagerAdapter
Fragment for admin search features/functionality
AdminUserAdapter
This is the adapter for the users page that admins can browse
AdminUserAdapter.UserViewHolder
ViewHolder used for the user data
CancelledListFragment
The fragment for organizers to view the users in the cancelled list
CreateEditEventFragmentTest
UI test class for the CreateEditEventFragment.
CreateEventViewModel
Creates an event view model
CustomNotificationFragment
This is the fragment for custom notifications
EntrantActivity
EntrantActivity is the main activity for the Entrant user role.
EntrantActivityTest
UI Test cases for EntrantActivity.
EntrantDatabase
Class holding all the entrant related functions that interact with the database.
EntrantDatabase.EventListType
enumerates the types of event lists
EntrantDatabase.OnEventFoundListener
Interface for event finding methods and errors associated with it
EntrantDatabase.OnEventsLoadedListener
Interface for event loading methods and errors associated with it
EntrantDatabase.OnFieldUpdateListener
Interface for updating fields and the associated error handling
EntrantDatabase.OnOperationCompleteListener
Interface for operation completion checks.
EntrantDatabase.OnProfileImageLoadedListener
Interface for loading images and associated error handling
EntrantDatabase.OnStatusCheckListener
Interface for status checking methods and errors associated with it
EntrantDatabase.OnUserCheckListener
Interface that defines callback methods
EntrantDatabase.OnUserLoadedListener
Interface for handling the result of loading a User from Firestore.
EntrantHomeFragment
EntrantHomeFragment serves as the main home view for Entrants, displaying different categories of events in tabs: Registered Events, Joined Events, and Missed Out events.
EntrantNotificationsFragment
Fragment that displays the notification page for the entrant
EntrantQRCodeScannerFragment
The fragment for entrants to scan QR Codes.
Event
The Event class represents an event created by an organizer.
EventDetailsFragment
The EventDetailsFragment class displays detailed information about a specific event.
EventParticipantsViewPagerAdapter
An adapter class for managing fragments in a ViewPager that displays different lists of event participants.
EventsAdapter
The EventsAdapter class provides a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of events.
EventsAdapter.EventsViewHolder
A view holder class for holding references to the views for a single event item in the RecyclerView.
FinalListFragment
The fragment for organizers to view the users in the final list
FirestoreUtils
Class holding all the Firestore utility related functions that interact with the database.
FirestoreUtilsTest
 
Image
The Image class represents an image associated with an event or user profile.
JoinedEventsFragment
Fragment for the entrants page that shows users joined events
MissedOutFragment
MissedOutFragment displays a list of events that the user missed out on.
Notification
The Notification class represents a notification sent to users about events or updates.
NotificationAdapter
This is the adapter for notifications entrants can view on their notification page
NotificationAdapter.NotificationViewHolder
ViewHolder used for the notification
NotificationListener
This is a class for notification listeners
NotificationListener.NotificationCallback
 
NotificationsDatabase
Class holding all the notification related functions that interact with the database.
NotificationsDatabase.OnNotificationsLoadedListener
Interface for handling notification loading methods
OrganizerActivity
OrganizerActivity is the main activity for the Organizer user role.
OrganizerActivityUITest
Simplified UI Test class for OrganizerActivity.
OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment
OrganizerCreateEditEventFragment provides a form for organizers to create a new event.
OrganizerDatabase
Class holding all the organizer related functions that interact with the database.
OrganizerDatabase.OnEventCapLoadedListener
Interface for handling results from loading event capacities and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnEventDetailsFetchListener
Interface for handling results from fetching event details and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnEventLoadedListener
Interface for handling the result of loading an event from Firestore.
OrganizerDatabase.OnEventsLoadedListener
Interface for handling results from loading events and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnFacilityDataLoadedListener
Interface for handling results from loading facility data and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnIsPendingStatusCheckedListener
Interface for methods related to checking if status' are pending and errors associated with it
OrganizerDatabase.OnOperationCompleteListener
Interface for completing operations associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnOrganizerDetailsLoadedListener
Interface for handling results from loading organizer details and associated errors
OrganizerDatabase.OnSelectedListLoadCountListener
Interface for handling results from getting the count from the selected list and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnStatusCheckListener
Interface for methods related to status' and errors associated with it
OrganizerDatabase.OnUserCheckListener
Interface for dealing with user checking and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnUserIdsLoadedListener
Interface for handling results from loading user Ids and associated error handling
OrganizerDatabase.OnUserStatusCheckListener
Interface for methods related to checking user status' and errors associated with it
OrganizerDatabase.OnWaitListCountLoadedListener
Interface for loading wait list counts and associated errors
OrganizerHomeFragment
OrganizerHomeFragment displays a list of events created by the organizer.
OrganizerQRCodeViewFragment
OrganizerQRCodeViewFragment displays a QR code for a specific event.
ProfileFragment
This is the fragment which displays the users profile and all the functionality for it
qrCode
The qrCode class represents a QR code associated with an event.
RegisteredEventsFragment
Registered events fragment contains the functionality for an entrants registered events
SelectedListFragment
SelectedListFragment displays the list of users selected to participate in a specific event.
SignupActivity
SignupActivity is responsible for user registration and Firebase Firestore setup.
SignupActivityUITest
UI Test class for SignupActivity.
SignUpDatabase
Class holding all the signup page related functions that interact with the database.
User
The User class represents a user in the application with details such as device ID, contact information, roles, and lists of events they are associated with.
UserDatabase
Class holding all the user class related functions that interact with the database.
UserDatabase.OnLocationSavedListener
Interface for location saving success and errors associated with it
UserDatabase.OnUserLoadedListener
 
UserDatabaseTest
 
UsersAdapter
An adapter class for displaying a list of users in a RecyclerView.
UsersAdapter.UsersViewHolder
A RecyclerView.ViewHolder that holds the views for each user item.
UsersInEventAdapter
An adapter class for displaying a list of users in a RecyclerView.
UsersInEventAdapter.UsersViewHolder
A RecyclerView.ViewHolder that holds the views for each user item.
ViewPagerAdapter
A FragmentStateAdapter that returns a fragment corresponding to one of the sections/tabs/pages.
ViewParticipantsFragment
ViewParticipantsFragment displays tabs for viewing different participant lists (e.g., Waiting, Selected, Final, Cancelled) for a specific event.
WaitingListFragment
WaitingListFragment displays the list of users on the waiting list for a specific event.
WorldMapPinsOverlay
This class displays the pins on the world map indicating locations for users who have joined events
